examples: You can beautify your home or office without spending a lot of money
She features murals of outdoor scenes that will beautify your kitchen
His accusations were false, but they served to besmirch her reputation
Anyone concerned that the scandals can besmirch Barcelona's reputation can rest easy
He was at ease with the bizarre discussion
I found the whole situation very bizarre
You will feel more buoyant and optimistic about the future than you have for a long time

bygone.definition: A thing dating from an earlier time
examples: The room had the elegance of a bygone era
She didn't want to tell about bygone days
